data.name: tiltfire
data.detailed_description:
Ignite your rocketship engines and zoom your way through the caves of tiltfire.
Fly around tight corners and blast AI drones in this fast paced top-down shooter.

In tiltfire you control a rocketship through mostly linear 2D caves,
which are riddled with obstacles and hostile AI controlled drones.
In every cave your goal is to reach the teleporter, which teleports you to the next cave.
Traversing every cave in a stage fast enough awards you with a trophy.

Simple, yet convincing physics makes flying in tiltfire a joyride.

Features:

  • Dead simple, buttery smooth controls.
  • Over 70 meticulously designed levels spanning across 12 stages.
  • High explosive missiles, homing missiles, laser guns, fast firing machine guns.
  • Various obstacles, including saw blades and laser traps.
  • You get to choose from 4 different weapons, which each fire in controlled bursts.
  • Different types of drones which behave differently and use different guns.
  • A level editor.
  • An electronic soundtrack, which suits the look and feel of the game.

Created by a solo developer on a homemade game engine.

tiltfire soundtrack by Dry Valley and \aleph_{0}.

data.short_description: Ignite your rocketship engines and zoom your way through the caves of tiltfire. Fly around tight corners and blast AI drones in this fast paced top-down shooter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
